author: ijjk
message:
Update nextjs-bot config (#81138)

Follow-up from https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/81134 updating the
email used in commit messages as well.

files.patch:
@@ -31,7 +31,7 @@ jobs:
       - name: Set Git author
         run: |
           git config user.name "nextjs-bot"
-          git config user.email "infra+release@vercel.com"
+          git config user.email "it+nextjs-bot@vercel.com"
 
       - name: Setup node
         uses: actions/setup-node@v4

@@ -28,7 +28,7 @@ async function main() {
   await exec(`node ${SCRIPT}`)
 
   await exec(`git config user.name "nextjs-bot"`)
-  await exec(`git config user.email "infra+release@vercel.com"`)
+  await exec(`git config user.email "it+nextjs-bot@vercel.com"`)
   await exec(`git checkout -b ${branchName}`)
   await exec(`git add -A`)
   await exec(`git commit --message ${branchName}`)
